description: Styx and Stone (Jacob Eishorn and Gerald Stone) are two fictional comic book characters in the Marvel Comics universe.  They are a criminal duo that have crossed Spider-Man's path on a number of occasions. They were created by David Michelinie and Todd McFarlane and first appeared in The Amazing Spider-Man #309. They reappeared in issues #332-333 and #376-377 of the same series.
name: Styx and Stone
powers: his clawlike hands disintegrate all organic material within seconds
Claw-like hands that disintegrate all organic material within seconds
Wears two large weapons on his shoulders
